function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Authors not presenting required data for meta-analysis","Impact":"Inability to include studies in meta-analysis, potential bias in results","Mitigation":"Contact authors for missing data, use sensitivity analysis for studies with missing data","Technologies":"Contacting authors for missing data, statistical sensitivity analysis","People":"Research authors","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"High heterogeneity in study populations, design, and exposure","Impact":"Difficulty in conducting meta-analysis, potential distortion of results","Mitigation":"Assess known heterogeneity, consider alternative statistical methods, use sensitivity analysis","Technologies":"Statistical sensitivity analysis, alternative statistical methods","People":"Research team","Owner":"Researchers conducting meta-analysis"},{"Description":"Studies with high risk of bias or low quality not excluded from sensitivity analysis","Impact":"Influence of bias on results, decreased reliability of findings","Mitigation":"Strictly exclude studies with high risk of bias or low quality, use objective criteria for exclusion","Technologies":"Risk of bias assessment tools, quality appraisal checklist","People":"Research team","Owner":"Researchers conducting sensitivity analysis"}]}
